room_title: Escape room "The Alchemist" by Tyler Escape Room in Tyler
room_description:
You find yourself locked in a room where an old alchemist was driven insane. He went insane from his relentless pursuit of trying to invent gold from common elements.
Sounds impossible, but was it?
You are now assigned with the task to find the alchemist. Is he dead or alive?
You have only one hour before the kings army discovers you snooping around the castle.
If they find you, you will be executed by a decree from the King.
Your objective is to find the alchemist, and to find out if he was able to make gold, and then escape. Your life depends on it.
Good luck, if you dare to accept your assignment !!
